text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

translation.en: Or have they a share of dominion? Then [if that were so], they would not give the people [even as much as] the speck on a date seed
translation.id: Ataukah mereka mempunyai bagian dari kerajaan (kekuasaan), meskipun mereka tidak akan memberikan sedikit pun (kebajikan) kepada manusia
